name: Colorful Slip-Ons
story: I got these on a whim from the Quickie Mart bargain bin. I had budget burning a hole in my pocket.

name: Red Vans
story: These were my second pair of Vans ever. I saw them all gunked up on a thrift store shelf and loved them! I washed them and changed the shoe laces and now they're some of my favorite shoes to wear.

name: Purple Vans
story: I got these in a batch of shoes from Quickie Mart. I realized that I didn't like them as much as the other shoes I had gotten. But then I found a way to make them more awesome. Glow-in-the-dark shoestrings from Dollar Tree. Booyah.

name: Donkey Kongs
story: I used to follow a bunch of artists on Instagram. That's the end of that story. I don't know why I would've bought these online if it weren't for somebody making me want them. I don't remember the story exactly. I wanted Vans like Charlie wears on It's Always Sunny. They have pink soles. I couldn't find any like them then I saw these have special soles. Black with white text. GAME. OVER. I had to have them.
